TopicTitle: You know you're a geek when:

Articles.Content:
This is a lot like the you know you're a nerd when: thread, except it's about being a geek.  I'll start:

You know you're a geek when you wish you could change Siri's voice to sound like Hal.
If you've ever used the word "canon" in a non- religious context.
You know you're a geek if you play KSP seriously, but not too seriously.

You know your a geek when you have a NES, the Powerglove, a SNES and a growing gaming collection...

Not to mention I've got a part of the Russian Buran shuttle and part of (what was) the American shuttles Atlantis and Endeavor.
You know you're a geek when you can't go an hour without making a science fiction reference.
when the diction-array is up to date with the conservator and progressist.
